entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High 26. Humidex 30. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low 8. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
